constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: CONARA Name: Richmond Road Conservation Area
TPPNT Ref: RBK.07.11Tree ref: T1Tree type: SILV2Description: RBK Order no: 07 Year: 2011

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All applications for developments likely to attract birds or connected with an aviation use.Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The tree was made subject to a TPO in 2011 and since that time has not put on any additional growth as evidenced by historic street view photos. The condition of the tree was clarified as being healthy and well shaped by conversation with the Tree Surgeon, confirming what can be seen in street view photos. As a mature specimen Silver Birch, unnecessary reduction work is not advisable for tree health and would likely push the tree into decline as is typical with the species. There is no justification for such works and as such the application should be refused.
description: T.1 Silver Birch - Reduce the overall crown size of the tree by removal of 1.5-2m in crown height and up to 1-1.5m in lateral width all round whilst retaining healthy growth.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
